dcterms:creator: Geoffrey Hinton
Oriol Vinyals
Jeff Dean
dcterms:description: A large dataset containing 17000 hours of labeled data collected from anonymous online users' search queries in Mandarin, used for training deep LSTM models for speech recognition.
dcterms:title: Shenma Voice Search Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 7300 hours of labeled data collected for voice search in navigation tasks, used to demonstrate transfer learning from the Shenma voice search dataset.
dcterms:title: Amap Voice Search Dataset
